s.text: Jules Verne is said to have been inspired by a visit here to write Journey to the Center of the Earth.
Building was slow and sporadic, affected by wars and finance, and the great work took nearly four centuries to complete.

Established in the 18th century, the distillery still operates, and you can look through big windows at copper stills bubbling away, producing a hot, colorless spirit, which is poured over juniper berries to become gin.
